text: Miroslav Slušný (born 31 May 1964) is a Slovak ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1994 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Slovakia Category:Ski jumpers at the 1994 Winter Olympics Category:People from Ružomberok
title: Miroslav Slušný
